item.title: Has Crizac Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Crizac Ltd has declared a 400% dividend with an ex-date of February 4, 2026. However, the company has experienced negative total returns in recent periods, with a total return of -14.16% over the last 3 months and -19.0% over the last 6 months. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Metro Brands Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Metro Brands Ltd has declared a dividend of 60% with an ex-date of February 2, 2026, resulting in a dividend yield of 1.93%. Total returns have varied, showing declines in the short term but significant gains over longer periods. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Siyaram Silk Mills Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Siyaram Silk Mills Ltd has declared a dividend of 150% (₹4 per share) with an ex-date of February 2, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, longer-term performance shows significant growth, especially a total return of 200.37% over the past 5 years. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Share India Securities Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Share India Securities Ltd has declared a 20% dividend, with an ex-date of February 2, 2026. While recent short-term returns have been negative, the company has shown substantial growth over longer periods, particularly a total return of 2392.77% over the past five years. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has CG Power & Industrial Solutions Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: CG Power & Industrial Solutions Ltd has declared a 65% dividend, with an ex-date of January 30, 2026. While recent short-term returns have been negative, the company has shown substantial growth over longer periods, with a total return of 1396.06% over the last 5 years. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd has declared a dividend of 600% (₹5 per share) with an ex-date of January 30, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns over various periods, particularly in the long term. Time: Jan 29 2026 11:30 PM IST
